page.title: 13HEALTH
page.content: THERE IS AN INFANT WELFARE CLINIC IN OUR VILLAGE WHICH IS HELD IN THE BRYNCOCH COMMUNITY CENTRE EVERY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON AT 1.30.THE CLINIC IS RUN BY WEST GLAMORGAN AREA HEALTH AUTHORITY AND IS FOR MOTHERS AND CHILDREN UNDER 5 YEARS OF AGE.THERE IS A HEALTH VISITOR AND A DOCTOR THERE AND SOMETIMES ALSO A CLINIC NURSE.BABIES ARE WEIGHED AT EACH VISIT AND RECORDS ARE KEPT OF THE BABIES WEIGHT.THE BABIES ARE ALSO EXAMINED BY THE DOCTOR WHO TESTS THEIR HEARING AND SIMILAR THINGS,AND IT IS IN THIS CLINIC THAT THEY ARE IMMUNISED AGAINST DIPH THERIA,WHOOPING COUGH,TETANUS AND POLIO.THE HEALTH VISITOR IS AT THE CLINIC TO GIVE ADVICE TO THE MOTHERS ABOUT THE BABIES FOOD AND WELFARE.SIMILAR CLINICS ARE HELD THROUGHOUT THE AREA.
